author: Brodigan
description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

While Democrats have the best plan to protect and defend Jimmy Kimmel's career, Republicans have the best plan to help the American people on the issues that matter most to them. But don't take my word for it. Listen to the people polled by Reuters and Ipsos, who asked adults which party they felt had the better plan on a wide range of issues. If the midterms come down to the environment, Republicans are in trouble. If it comes down to any other issue, we should be a'ight.

Keep in mind, this poll took place between September 19th and 21st, when the left and the media (but I repeat myself) thought the most pressing issue facing the American peo
title: Shocking poll shows which party Americans trust more on important issues, and it's NOT the party crying over Jimmy Kimmel
